(area_cell_count, area_cell_count).explanation: A variable cannot have a causal relationship with itself as they represent the same measurement;

(area_cell_count, time).explanation: Increasing the number of cells in a chip design directly increases the computational complexity and processing time required for design tools and simulation;

(area_cell_count, area_net_area).explanation: More cells in a design require additional interconnect routing and wiring between components, directly increasing the net area needed for connections;
